name: tm46
effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Psywave)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
While attacking,
it may steal the
foe’s held item.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
While attacking,
it may steal the
foe’s held item.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that may
take the foe’s held
item if the user
isn’t holding one.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks and steals the foe’s
held item simultaneously. It can’t
steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user attacks and steals the foe’s
held item simultaneously. It can’t
steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user attacks and steals the foe’s
held item simultaneously. It can’t
steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks and steals the
target’s held item simultaneously. It
can’t steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks and steals the
target’s held item simultaneously. It
can’t steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user attacks and steals the target’s
held item simultaneously. The user can’t
steal anything if it already holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks and steals the target’s held item
simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it
already holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks and steals the target’s held item
simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it
already holds an item.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is attacked with an intense blast of
all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target
with a burn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This attack move varies in power and type
depending on the weather.
